channel.title: Pages on Home | Koen de Jong
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Home | Koen de Jong

item.title: About me
item.description: I was born in a small city in the South-East of the Netherlands called Venray. After high school, I moved to Enschede to pursue my interests at a higher education level. I am currently studying the bachelor Computer Science at the University of Twente. To be continued…

item.title: Now
item.description: I am busy studying. Of course, I am also working on some personal projects, but none of them are currently public. Next to that, I am active in couple of Inter-Actief committees, such as the DipsomanIA, Symposium Committee and MedIA. I am also a member of Hamers zonder Sikkel dispute, with whom I have a drink every Wednesday.
